revision.text:
The '''Header''' is the first 12 bytes of any [[WAD]]. it contains the basic information needed to read in the [[Directory]]

* 4 bytes: MUST be either "IWAD" or "PWAD". "IWAD" is only for commercial or registered versions. "PWAD" is for Patch WADs that can be distributed. * 4 bytes: long integer that is the number of [[Lump]]s in the wad. * 4 bytes: long integer equal to the file offset to the directory [[Category:Glossary]]
